item.description:
Let's go out to Gloucester for a fun night of Horribles in the parade....and maybe some tootsie rolls (yum) and then stay for the fireworks over the Harbor.

 

We will meet in St. Peters square in front of Cape Ann Brewery, walk around, grab a bite to eat and then find our spot for the parade.  Once the parade is over we can locate a good place to watch the fireworks.

 

We will celebrate our Independence, socialize with friends and I am sure there will be a lot of laughter, joking and fun.

So grab that bag chair and come on out to Gloucester.

Remember if you get lost, are running late or can't find us, please call the Meetup Cell phone at 978-304-2811.

Hope to see you there

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of Cape Anne Brewery
item.name: Gloucester Horribles Parade & Fireworks
